name: Foto Fitter
overview: Follow Foto Fitter on his mission through countryside, deserts, industrial landscapes and wooded forests in his quest to seek out and identify four very famous faces! With only his roll of film to protect him, Foto Fitter must travel across each 3-D Perspective scrolling landscape, collecting 6 pieces to complete the Foto Fit. One piece is located at the east side, and one piece located at the west side of the landscape. Do this 3 times over in each landscape to progress to the next level and a new Foto Fit to collect and identify. But beware the numerous hazards which sap your energy.
